00008 /*
00009  * epi_usage - print the available command line arguments
00010  */
00011 void
00012 epi_usage(void)
00013 {
00014         printf("==> ./test [--opt=val]+ \n");
00015         printf("\n");
00016         printf("Optional arguments:\n");
00017         printf("\tic: input file for infectivity stage data, default: ic.txt\n");
00018         printf("\tnsick: specify number of agents initially infected \n" \
00019                 "\t\t [ ignored when reading from input file ]\n");
00020         printf("\toutput: output file for agent moves and status changes\n");
00021         printf("\n");
00022 
00023         exit(0);
00024 }
00025 
00026 /*
00027  * epi_setup_options - parse the command line arguments
00028  */
00029 void
00030 epi_setup_options(int argc, char ** argv)
00031 {
00032         int              c;
00033 
00034         char             hospital_fn[1024];
00035         char             log_fn[1024];
00036 
00037         g_epi_nsick = 0;
00038         g_epi_ic_fn = tw_calloc(TW_LOC, "", sizeof(char), 255);
00039         g_epi_position_fn = tw_calloc(TW_LOC, "", sizeof(char), 255);
00040         sprintf(hospital_fn, "%s/hospital.log", g_rn_logs_dir),
00041         sprintf(log_fn, "%s/epi.log", g_rn_logs_dir);
00042 
00043         printf("\nEpi User Specified Input Parameters: \n\n");
00044 
00045         opterr = 0;
00046         optind = 0;
00047 
00048         while(-1 != (c = getopt(argc, argv, "-W:U:h:T:D:S:I:B:M:2:")))
00049         {
00050                 switch(c)
00051                 {
00052                         case 'I':
00053                                 strcpy(g_epi_ic_fn, optarg);
00054                                 printf("\t%-50s %11s\n", "IC File", g_epi_ic_fn);
00055                                 break;
00056                         case 'S':
00057                                 g_epi_psick = atof(optarg);
00058                                 printf("\t%-50s %11f\n", "Probability Agents are Sick", g_epi_psick);
00059                                 break;
00060                         case 'M':
00061                                 g_epi_position_fn = tw_calloc(TW_LOC, "", sizeof(char), 255);
00062                                 strcpy(g_epi_position_fn, optarg);
00063                                 printf("\t%-50s %11s\n", "Position (Agent Moves) File", g_epi_position_fn);
00064                                 g_epi_position_f = fopen(g_epi_position_fn, "w");
00065                                 if (!g_epi_position_f)
00066                                         tw_printf(TW_LOC, "Unable to create output file: %s \n",
00067                                                 g_epi_position_fn);
00068                                 break;
00069                         case 'W':
00070                                 g_epi_worried_well_rate = atof(optarg);
00071                                 printf("\t%-50s %11f\n", "Probability of being Worried Well", g_epi_worried_well_rate);
00072                                 break;
00073                         case 'T':
00074                                 g_epi_worried_well_threshold = atof(optarg);
00075                                 printf("\t%-50s %11f\n", "Worried Well threshold", g_epi_worried_well_threshold);
00076                                 break;
00077                         case 'U':
00078                                 g_epi_mod = atoi(optarg);
00079 
00080                                 printf("\t%-50s %11d\n", 
00081                                         "Reporting Interval", 
00082                                         g_epi_mod);
00083                                 break;
00084                         case 'D':
00085                                 g_epi_worried_well_duration = atoi(optarg);
00086                                 printf("\t%-50s %11d\n", "Worried Well duration", g_epi_worried_well_duration);
00087                                 break;
00088                         case '2':
00089                                 g_epi_work_while_sick_p = atof(optarg);
00090                                 printf("\t%-50s %11f\n", "Probability agent will go to work while sick",
00091                                         g_epi_work_while_sick_p);
00092                                 break;
00093                         case 'B':
00094                                 if ( strcmp(optarg, "HOME") == 0 )
00095                                 {
00096                                         g_epi_stay_home = 1;
00097                                         printf("\tAll agents stay home and use the network\n");
00098                                 }
00099                                 break;
00100                         case 'h':
00101                                 sprintf(hospital_fn, "%s", optarg);
00102                                 break;
00103                 }
00104         }
00105 
00106         if(0 == strcmp(g_epi_ic_fn, ""))
00107                 sprintf(g_epi_ic_fn, "tools/%s/ic.txt", g_rn_tools_dir);
00108 
00109         /*
00110          * Fix-up vars, open output files, etc
00111          */
00112         if(NULL == (g_epi_log_f = fopen(log_fn, "w")))
00113                 tw_error(TW_LOC, "Unable to open: %s \n", log_fn);
00114 
00115         if(NULL == (g_epi_hospital_f = fopen(hospital_fn, "w")))
00116                 tw_error(TW_LOC, "Unable to open: %s \n", hospital_fn);
00117 
00118         printf("\n");
00119 }
